Contract_Date: Information not available in the contract
Effective_Date: The insurance protection begins at the time stated in the application, if you pay the first premium immediately after due date.
End_Date: The contract can be terminated with a period of 3 months before the end of the agreed contract period.
Membership_Description: The insurance applies in the event of breakdown, accident or theft of the insured vehicle, illness, injury or death of an insured person, loss of certain items, unforeseen travel interruptions, emergencies or prosecution abroad.
